message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I'm confident that you'll find it's worth every penny, but I'm open to negotiating if you have any concerns. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
